Detailed Description

AT90USB driver: Internal functions and definitions.

This header is for internal use only. There is lots of ugly preprocessor stuff in here so that the rest of the code can be reasonably clean and efficient.

Copyright (C) 2009 Atmel Corporation. All rights reserved.

Definition in file at90usb_internal.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum at90usb_ep_flag

Endpoint states.

Enumerator:
AT90USB_EP_ALLOCATED 

Endpoint is allocated

AT90USB_EP_ACTIVE_XFER 

Endpoint is active with a transfer

AT90USB_EP_ENABLED 

Endpoint is enabled

AT90USB_EP_IS_IN 

Endpoint is in IN mode

AT90USB_EP_WEDGE 

Endpoint is in wedge state

Definition at line 74 of file at90usb_internal.h.

enum ep0_state

Control endpoint state.

Enumerator:
EP0_STATE_SETUP 

Waiting for SETUP

EP0_STATE_DATA_IN 

IN data being sent

EP0_STATE_DATA_ZLP 

Zero-Length Packet being sent

EP0_STATE_DATA_OUT 

Waiting for OUT data

EP0_STATE_STATUS_IN 

IN status sent

EP0_STATE_STATUS_OUT 

Waiting for OUT status
